item.title: 【Introductions & Farewells】Im Back...
item.description: You might have noticed that I have been absent for months on the forum, I'm sorry about that. I am so focused on other stuff that's why (I have ADHD). Anyways, Prepare for a live performance of Fujii Kaze from NHK World Japan X NPR Music's tiny desk concert JAPAN program. (Yep, that exists.)
item.author: charlescanlom
